configuration_keys.name: .appconfig.featureflag/FoundationaLLM.Agent.PrivateStore
configuration_keys.description: Feature flag used to enable or disable the agent private store feature

configuration_keys.name: .appconfig.featureflag/FoundationaLLM.Agent.SelfService
configuration_keys.description: Feature flag used to enable or disable the agent self service feature

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings related to the FoundationaLLM instance.

configuration_keys.name: Id
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the FoundationaLLM instance.

configuration_keys.name: SecurityGroupRetrievalStrategy
configuration_keys.description: The security group retrieval strategy of the FoundationaLLM instance.

configuration_keys.name: IdentitySubstitutionSecurityPrincipalId
configuration_keys.description: The object identifier of the security principal who is allowed to substitute its identity with a value provided in the X-USER-IDENTITY header.

configuration_keys.name: IdentitySubstitutionUserPrincipalNamePattern
configuration_keys.description: The Regex pattern used to validate the values allowed as User Principal Name (UPN) substitutes in the X-USER-IDENTITY header.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the Azure Key Vault settings related to the FoundationaLLM instance.

configuration_keys.name: KeyVaultURI
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Azure Key Vault providing the secrets.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the Python SDK settings.

configuration_keys.name: Logging:LogLevel:Default
configuration_keys.description: The default logging level used by the Python SDK.

configuration_keys.name: Logging:LogLevel:Azure
configuration_keys.description: The default logging level used by the Python SDK.

configuration_keys.name: Logging:EnableConsoleLogging
configuration_keys.description: The flag indicating whether the Python SDK sends logs to the console or not.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify settings for Azure Container Apps Dynamic Sessions code execution services.

configuration_keys.name: CodeInterpreter
configuration_keys.description: The settings for the Azure Container Apps Dynamic Sessions code interpreter code execution service.

configuration_keys.name: CustomContainer
configuration_keys.description: The settings for the Azure Container Apps Dynamic Sessions custom container code execution service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify settings for resource providers caching.

configuration_keys.name: EnableCache
configuration_keys.description: Setting that indicates whether the resource providers should use caching.

configuration_keys.name: AbsoluteCacheExpirationSeconds
configuration_keys.description: Absolute cache expiration in seconds.

configuration_keys.name: SlidingCacheExpirationSeconds
configuration_keys.description: Sets how many seconds the cache entry can be inactive (e.g. not accessed) before it will be removed. This will not extend the entry lifetime beyond the absolute expiration (if set).

configuration_keys.name: CacheSizeLimit
configuration_keys.description: The maximum number of items that can be stored in the cache.

configuration_keys.name: CacheExpirationScanFrequencySeconds
configuration_keys.description: Gets or sets the minimum length of time between successive scans for expired items in seconds.

dependency_injection_key.description: Dependency injection key used by the FoundationaLLM quota management service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the storage settings for the FoundationaLLM quota management service.

configuration_keys.name: AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Blob Storage account used by the FoundationaLLM quota management service. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage account used by the FoundationaLLM quota management service.

dependency_injection_key.description: Dependency injection key used by the FoundationaLLM.AIModel resource provider.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the storage settings for the FoundationaLLM.Context resource provider.

configuration_keys.name: AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Blob Storage account used by the FoundationaLLM.Context resource provider. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage account used by the FoundationaLLM.Context resource provider.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for all API endpoints.

Configuration section used to identify the authentication settings for the Authorization API. Due to its special nature, the Authorization API does not have a corresponding APIEndpointConfiguration resource.

configuration_keys.name: APIUrl
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Authorization API. Due to its special nature, the Authorization API does not have a corresponding APIEndpointConfiguration resource and thus the URL must be kept as a configuration setting.

configuration_keys.name: APIScope
configuration_keys.description: The scope required to get an access token for the Authorization API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableCache
configuration_keys.description: Setting that indicates whether the Authorization API Client should use caching.

configuration_keys.name: AbsoluteCacheExpirationSeconds
configuration_keys.description: Absolute cache expiration in seconds.

configuration_keys.name: SlidingCacheExpirationSeconds
configuration_keys.description: Sets how many seconds the cache entry can be inactive (e.g. not accessed) before it will be removed. This will not extend the entry lifetime beyond the absolute expiration (if set).

configuration_keys.name: CacheSizeLimit
configuration_keys.description: The maximum number of items that can be stored in the cache.

configuration_keys.name: CacheExpirationScanFrequencySeconds
configuration_keys.description: Gets or sets the minimum length of time between successive scans for expired items in seconds.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for Core API.

configuration_keys.name: APIUrl
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Core API. Since it's an entry point API, the Core API does not have a corresponding APIEndpointConfiguration resource and thus the URL must be kept as a configuration setting.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Core API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the main Core API settings.

configuration_keys.name: BypassGatekeeper
configuration_keys.description: The flag that indicates whether the Core API should bypass or not the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: AzureOpenAIAssistantsFileSearchFileExtensions
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list file extensions that are supported by the Azure OpenAI Assistants file search tool.
configuration_keys.value: c, cpp, cs, css, doc, docx, html, java, js, json, md, pdf, php, pptx, py, rb, sh, tex, ts, txt

configuration_keys.name: AzureAIAgentsFileSearchFileExtensions
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list file extensions that are supported by the Azure AI Agent Service file search tool.
configuration_keys.value: c, cpp, cs, css, doc, docx, html, java, js, json, md, pdf, php, pptx, py, rb, sh, tex, ts, txt

configuration_keys.name: AllowedUploadFileExtensions
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list file extensions that users are allowed to upload to a conversation.
configuration_keys.value: c, cpp, cs, css, csv, doc, docx, gif, html, java, jpeg, jpg, js, json, md, pdf, php, png, pptx, py, rb, sh, tar, tex, ts, txt, xlsx, xml, zip

configuration_keys.name: MaxUploadsPerMessage
configuration_keys.description: The maximum number of files that can be uploaded for a single conversation message.

configuration_keys.name: CompletionResponsePollingIntervalMilliseconds
configuration_keys.description: The size in seconds of the polling interval used to check for completion responses.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the Entra ID authentication settings for Core API.

configuration_keys.name: Instance
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Entra ID instance used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: TenantId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID tenant used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: Scopes
configuration_keys.description: The list of scopes exposed by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: CallbackPath
configuration_keys.description: The path where the Entra ID instance will redirect during authentication.

configuration_keys.name: ClientId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID app registration used by the Core API to authenticate.

configuration_keys.name: RequireScopes
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether a scope ("scp") claim is required for authorization.

configuration_keys.name: AllowACLAuthorization
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether tokens that do not have either of the "scp" or "roles" claims are accepted (true means they are accepted).

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the Cosmos DB settings for the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: Endpoint
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Azure Cosmos DB service used by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: Database
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Cosmos DB database used by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: Containers
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of database containers used by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: MonitoredContainers
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of database containers that are monitored for changes using the change feed.

configuration_keys.name: ChangeFeedLeaseContainer
configuration_keys.description: The name of the container used by Azure Cosmos DB to manage the change feed leases.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Core Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Core Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Core Worker service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the esential settings for the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableLakeraGuard
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Lakera Guard is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableEnkryptGuardrails
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Enkrypt Guardrails is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableAzureContentSafety
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Azure Content Safety is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableAzureContentSafetyPromptShields
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Azure Content Safety Prompt Shields is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableMicrosoftPresidio
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Microsoft Presidio is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Gatekeeper Integration API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Gatekeeper Integration API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Gatekeeper Integration API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Orchestration API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Orchestration API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Orchestration API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for storing persisted completion requests.

configuration_keys.name: CompletionRequestsStorage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for persisted completion requests.

configuration_keys.name: CompletionRequestsStorage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: CompletionRequestsStorage:ContainerName
configuration_keys.description: The name of the root container in the Azure Storage account.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the LangChain API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the LangChain API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the LangChain API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the main LangChain API settings.

configuration_keys.name: PollingIntervalSeconds
configuration_keys.description: The interval in seconds at which the LangChain API will be polled for status.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the main LangChain API settings for external modules.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for external modules.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Semantic Kernel API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Semantic Kernel API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Semantic Kernel API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the main Semantic Kernel API settings.

configuration_keys.name: MaxConcurrentCompletions
configuration_keys.description: The maximum number of background completion operations allowed to run in parallel. If a new completion request comes in and the maximum number is already reached, the request will generate an error.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Management API.

configuration_keys.name: APIUrl
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Management API. Since it's an entry point API, the Management API does not have a corresponding APIEndpointConfiguration resource and thus the URL must be kept as a configuration setting.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Management API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the Entra ID authentication settings for Management API.

configuration_keys.name: Instance
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Entra ID instance used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: TenantId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID tenant used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: Scopes
configuration_keys.description: The list of scopes exposed by the Management API.

configuration_keys.name: CallbackPath
configuration_keys.description: The path where the Entra ID instance will redirect during authentication.

configuration_keys.name: ClientId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID app registration used by the Management API to authenticate.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section for Management API.

configuration_keys.name: AllowedUploadFileExtensions
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list file extensions that users are allowed to upload to a conversation.
configuration_keys.value: c, cpp, cs, css, csv, doc, docx, gif, html, java, jpeg, jpg, js, json, md, pdf, php, png, pptx, py, rb, sh, tar, tex, ts, txt, xlsx, xml, zip

configuration_section.description: Configuration section for the FoundationaLLM Data Pipeline State service.

configuration_keys.name: CosmosDB:Endpoint
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Azure Cosmos DB service used by the Data Pipeline API service.

configuration_keys.name: CosmosDB:Database
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Cosmos DB database used by the Data Pipeline API service.

configuration_keys.name: CosmosDB:Containers
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of database containers used by the Data Pipeline API service.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for the FoundationaLLM Data Pipeline API service.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Data Pipeline API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Data Pipeline API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Data Pipeline API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section for the FoundationaLLM Data Pipeline API.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for the FoundationaLLM Data Pipeline API service.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: FrontendWorkerQueue
configuration_keys.description: The queue used to submit data pipeline work items for the Data Pipeline Frontend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: BackendWorkerQueue
configuration_keys.description: The queue used to submit data pipeline work items for the Data Pipeline Backend Worker service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Data Pipeline Frontend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey

configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Data Pipeline Frontend Worker service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section for the FoundationaLLM Data Pipeline Frontend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for the FoundationaLLM Data Pipeline Frontend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: Queue
configuration_keys.description: The queue used to process data pipeline work items by the Data Pipeline Frontend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: ParallelProcessorsCount
configuration_keys.description: The number of parallel processors of data pipeline run work items used by the Data Pipeline Frontend Worker service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Data Pipeline Backend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey

configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Data Pipeline Backend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for the FoundationaLLM Data Pipeline Backend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: Storage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: Queue
configuration_keys.description: The queue used to process data pipeline work items by the Data Pipeline Backend Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: ParallelProcessorsCount
configuration_keys.description: The number of parallel processors of data pipeline run work items used by the Data Pipeline Backend Worker service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Context API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Context API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Context API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section for the FoundationaLLM Context API.

configuration_keys.name: FileService:Storage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for the FoundationaLLM Context API file service.

configuration_keys.name: FileService:Storage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: FileService:CosmosDB:Endpoint
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Azure Cosmos DB service used by the Context API file service.

configuration_keys.name: FileService:CosmosDB:Database
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Cosmos DB database used by the Context API file service.

configuration_keys.name: FileService:CosmosDB:Containers
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of database containers used by the Context API file service.

configuration_keys.name: FileService:KnowledgeSearchFileExtensions
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of file extensions that are subject to knowledge search.
configuration_keys.value: c, cpp, cs, css, doc, docx, html, java, js, json, md, pdf, php, pptx, py, rb, sh, tex, ts, txt, gif, jpeg, jpg, png

configuration_keys.name: FileService:KnowledgeSearchContextFileExtensions
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of file extensions that indicate files that can be directly used in the context of a completion request.
configuration_keys.value: c, cs, cpp, css, html, java, js, json, jsonl, md, php, py, rb, sh, ts, tex, txt, gif, jpeg, jpg, png

configuration_keys.name: FileService:KnowledgeSearchContextFileMaxSizeBytes
configuration_keys.description: The dictionary of lists of extensions of files that can be directly used in the context of a completion request and their associated maximum file sizes.

configuration_keys.name: KnowledgeService:Storage:AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The Azure Storage account for the FoundationaLLM Context API knowledge service.

configuration_keys.name: KnowledgeService:Storage:AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Storage account. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: KnowledgeService:Embedding
configuration_keys.description: The settings used for embedding operations.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Gateway API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Gateway API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Gateway API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Gateway API.

configuration_keys.name: AzureOpenAIAccounts
configuration_keys.description: The semicolon-separated list of Azure OpenAI account names used by the Gateway API.

configuration_keys.name: AzureOpenAIAssistantsMaxVectorizationTimeSeconds
configuration_keys.description: The maximum time in seconds allowed for an Azure OpenAI Assistants vectorization process to complete.

configuration_keys.name: AzureAIAgentServiceMaxVectorizationTimeSeconds
configuration_keys.description: The maximum time in seconds allowed for an Azure AI Agent Service vectorization process to complete.

configuration_keys.name: TokenRateLimitMultiplier
configuration_keys.description: The multiplier applied to the token rate limit used to account for differences in tokenization between the Gateway API and the embedding model.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Gateway Adapter API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Gateway Adapter API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Gateway Adapter API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the State API.

configuration_keys.name: APIUrl
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the State API. This entry supports the dependency of the Orchestration implementations to retrieve the URL. Python APIs do not have a resource provider implementation to retrieve the details.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the State API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the State API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the Cosmos DB settings for the State API.

configuration_keys.name: Endpoint
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Azure Cosmos DB service used by the State API.

configuration_keys.name: Database
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Cosmos DB database used by the State API.

configuration_keys.name: Containers
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of database containers used by the State API.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Azure OpenAI service.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Azure OpenAI service.

dependency_injection_key.description: Dependency injection key used to inject the implementation of IIndexingService based on Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL vector store service.

dependency_injection_key.description: Dependency injection key used to inject the implementation of IIndexingService based on Azure PostgreSQL.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Azure PostgreSQL vector store service.
Configuration section used to identify the essential settings for the Azure Event Grid service.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Azure Event Grid service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Azure Event Grid service.

configuration_keys.name: NamespaceId
configuration_keys.description: The object identifier of the Azure Event Grid Namespace object used by the Azure Event Grid event service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Azure AI Studio service.
Configuration section used to identify the settings for storage account used by the Azure AI Studio service.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Azure Content Safety service.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Azure Content Safety service.

configuration_keys.name: HateSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of hate language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).

configuration_keys.name: SelfHarmSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of self-harm language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).

configuration_keys.name: SexualSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of sexual language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).

configuration_keys.name: ViolenceSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of violent language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Lakera Guard service.
Configuration section used to identify the settings for the Encrypt Guardrails service.
Configuration section used to identify the branding settings for the User Portal.

configuration_keys.name: AccentColor
configuration_keys.description: Accent color.

configuration_keys.name: AccentTextColor
configuration_keys.description: Accent text color.

configuration_keys.name: BackgroundColor
configuration_keys.description: BackgroundColor.

configuration_keys.name: CompanyName
configuration_keys.description: Company name.

configuration_keys.name: FavIconUrl
configuration_keys.description: Fav icon url.

configuration_keys.name: AgentIconUrl
configuration_keys.description: The agent icon that displays next to the agent select list and agent responses. Can be an absolute URL, relative path, or base64string value.

configuration_keys.name: KioskMode
configuration_keys.description: Kiosk mode.

configuration_keys.name: LogoText
configuration_keys.description: Logo text.

configuration_keys.name: LogoUrl
configuration_keys.description: Logo url.

configuration_keys.name: PageTitle
configuration_keys.description: Page title.

configuration_keys.name: PrimaryColor
configuration_keys.description: Primary color.

configuration_keys.name: PrimaryTextColor
configuration_keys.description: Primary text color.

configuration_keys.name: SecondaryColor
configuration_keys.description: Secondary color.

configuration_keys.name: SecondaryTextColor
configuration_keys.description: Secondary text color.

configuration_keys.name: PrimaryButtonBackgroundColor
configuration_keys.description: Primary button background color.

configuration_keys.name: PrimaryButtonTextColor
configuration_keys.description: Primary button text color.

configuration_keys.name: SecondaryButtonBackgroundColor
configuration_keys.description: Secondary button background color.

configuration_keys.name: SecondaryButtonTextColor
configuration_keys.description: Secondary button text color.

configuration_keys.name: FooterText
configuration_keys.description: Footer text.

configuration_keys.name: NoAgentsMessage
configuration_keys.description: Message to display to users when their agent list is empty.
configuration_keys.value: No agents available. Please check with your system administrator for assistance.

configuration_keys.name: DefaultAgentWelcomeMessage
configuration_keys.description: Message to display when starting a new conversation with an agent. This is displayed when the agent is not selected or if the selected agent does not have a configured welcome message.
configuration_keys.value: Start the conversation using the text box below.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for Entra ID authentication in the User Portal.

configuration_keys.name: Instance
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Entra ID instance used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: TenantId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID tenant used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: Scopes
configuration_keys.description: The list of scopes used to get the authentication token for the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: CallbackPath
configuration_keys.description: The path where the Entra ID instance will redirect during authentication.

configuration_keys.name: ClientId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID app registration used by the User Portal to authenticate.

configuration_keys.name: TimeoutInMinutes
configuration_keys.description: The timeout in minutes for the auth token in the User Portal.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the configuration for the User Portal.

configuration_keys.name: ShowLastConversationOnStartup
configuration_keys.description: If true, the last conversation will be displayed when the user logs in. Otherwise, a new conversation placeholder appears on page load.

configuration_keys.name: ShowMessageRating
configuration_keys.description: If true, rating options on agent messages will appear.

configuration_keys.name: ShowMessageTokens
configuration_keys.description: If true, the number of consumed tokens on agent and user messages will appear.

configuration_keys.name: ShowViewPrompt
configuration_keys.description: If true, the 'View Prompt' button on agent messages will appear.

configuration_keys.name: ShowFileUpload
configuration_keys.description: Global setting to determine if file upload is allowed on chat messages.

configuration_keys.name: AgentManagementPermissionRequestUrl
configuration_keys.description: The URL to request agent management permissions.

configuration_keys.name: FeaturedAgentNames
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of featured agent names.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for Entra ID authentication in the Management Portal.

configuration_keys.name: Instance
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Entra ID instance used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: TenantId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID tenant used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: Scopes
configuration_keys.description: The list of scopes used to get the authentication token for the Management API.

configuration_keys.name: CallbackPath
configuration_keys.description: The path where the Entra ID instance will redirect during authentication.

configuration_keys.name: ClientId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID app registration used by the Management Portal to authenticate.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the settings for data sources resources managed by the FoundationaLLM.DataSource resource provider.

configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether on-premises account names must be retrieved by the Microsoft Graph API.
